ImageItem.internal_link_text: Database connection string for worker role
Database connection string for worker role

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: <ConfigurationSettings> <Setting name="StorageConnectionString" /> <Setting name="ContosoAdsDbConnectionString" /> </ConfigurationSettings>

<Role name="ContosoAdsWorker"> <Instances count="1" /> <ConfigurationSettings> <Setting name="StorageConnectionString" value="{yourconnectionstring}" /> <Setting name="ContosoAdsDbConnectionString" value="{yourconnectionstring}" />
</ConfigurationSettings>
</Role>

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: <connectionStrings> <add name="ContosoAdsContext" connectionString="Data Source=(localdb)\v11.0; Initial Catalog=ContosoAds; Integrated Security=True; MultipleActiveResultSets=True;" providerName="System.Data.SqlClient" /> </connectionStrings>
